<definitions name="ApprovePurchase_BPEL" targetNamespace="ApprovePurchase_BPEL" xmlns:ns1="urn:WS/types" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:po="http://wlmse.sample/po" xmlns:plink="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/plnktype" xmlns:tm="Tm_wlmSample1" xmlns:bpws="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/varprop" xmlns:ns="http://wlmse.sample/po" xmlns:tns="ApprovePurchase_BPEL" xmlns:ns0="ApprovePurchase_Common" xmlns:file="http://schemas.sun.com/jbi/wsdl-extensions/file/"> <!--Type definitions--> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="ApprovePurchase_BPEL"> <xsd:import schemaLocation="PurchaseOrder.xsd" namespace="http://wlmse.sample/po"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="OrderInput"> <part name="OrderInfo" element="ns:purchaseOrder"/> </message> <message name="OrderOutput"> <part name="ApprovalInfo" element="ns:orderReply"/> </message> <portType name="purcharseOrderPT"> <operation name="receivePurchaseOrder"> <input name="orderInput" message="tns:OrderInput"/> <!--<output name="orderOutput" message="tns:OrderOutput"/>--> </operation> </portType> <portType name="purcharseOrderFileOutPT"> <operation name="receivePurchaseOrder"> <input name="orderOutput" message="tns:OrderOutput"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="purchaseOrderBinding" type="tns:purcharseOrderPT"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="receivePurchaseOrder"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="receivePurchaseOrder"/> <input name="orderInput"> <soap:body parts="OrderInfo" use="literal"/> </input> <!--<output name="orderOutput"> <soap:body parts="ApprovalInfo" use="literal"/> </output>--> </operation> </binding> <binding name="purchaseOrderFileOutBinding" type="tns:purcharseOrderFileOutPT"> <file:binding/> <operation name="receivePurchaseOrder"> <file:operation/> <input name="orderOutput"> <file:message use="literal" fileName="PurchaseOrderOutput.xml" multipleRecordsPerFile="false" part="ApprovalInfo" fileNameIsPattern="false" addEOL="false"/> </input> </operation> </binding> <service name="purchaseOrderService"> <port name="purchaseOrderPort" binding="tns:purchaseOrderBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:12100/service/WLMSESample1PurchaseOrderService"/> </port> </service> <service name="purchaseOrderFileOutService"> <port name="purchaseOrderFileOutPort" binding="tns:purchaseOrderFileOutBinding"> <file:address fileDirectory="/home/mei/work/open-jbi-components/driver-tests/wlmse/Basic_User_Group/PurchaseOrderCompositeApp/test/soapui/output"/> </port> </service> <plink:partnerLinkType name="purchasingLT"> <plink:role name="purchaseOrderService" portType="tns:purcharseOrderPT"/> </plink:partnerLinkType> <bpws:property name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/> <bpws:propertyAlias propertyName="tns:orderId" messageType="tns:OrderInput" part="OrderInfo"> <bpws:query>/po:purchaseOrder/po:orderId</bpws:query> </bpws:propertyAlias> <bpws:propertyAlias propertyName="tns:orderId" messageType="tns:OrderOutput" part="ApprovalInfo"> <bpws:query>/po:orderReply/po:orderId</bpws:query> </bpws:propertyAlias> </definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://wlmse.sample/po" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://wlmse.sample/po" xmlns="http://wlmse.sample/po"> <xsd:element name="purchaseOrder" type="PurchaseOrderType"/> <xsd:element name="orderReply" type="OrderReplyType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PurchaseOrderType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="purchaserName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="productId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="users" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="priority" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ApprovalResult"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Approved"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Rejected"/> <!--and so on ...--> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OrderReplyType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="approveResult" type="ApprovalResult"/> <xsd:element name="replyDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
